title.narrative: Education and resilience in children and adolescents through an integrated educational package.

description.narrative: - Rehabilitation of targeted schools, including infrastructure and sanitation facilities - Training and capacity building of teachers and improving the quality of education - Pay monthly salaries for 196 beneficiaries

Contribute to the promotion of access to education and reduce dropout among females and males through the provision of existing means of infrastructure and securing the requirements of education and raise the level of education provided by providing training for teachers in accordance with international curricula and improve the psychological and social well-being of children and teachers.
